name: Jade Chamber
description:
Roll Phase: 2 initial Elemental Dice will be of the same Elemental type as your active character.
When Action Phase begins: If you have no more than 3 cards in your Hand, discard this card and create 1 Omni Element.
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase</color>: 2 initial Elemental Dice will be of the same Elemental type as your active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If you have no more than 3 cards in your Hand, discard this card and create 1 $[K411].
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Roll Phase</color>: 2 initial Elemental Dice will be of the same Elemental type as your active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When Action Phase begins:</color> If you have no more than 3 cards in your Hand, discard this card and create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>.
storytext: "They say that it contains a thousand dazzling jewels."
source: Reward for accepting Bu'yun's Adventure Challenge in the open world and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
